subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira returned to the lineup and drove in two runs, but the rest of the team could not bunch together the hits it has been searching for, and New York lost to Oakland, 5-2.
snippet: Mark Teixeira returned to the lineup and drove in two runs, but the rest of the team could not bunch together the hits it has been searching for, and New York lost to Oakland, 5-2.
